sources.title: Treace Medical Concepts - Wikipedia
sources.snippet: Treace Medical Concepts, Inc. is a medical device company, headquartered in Ponte Vedra Beach, Florida, specializing in the design, manufacture, and marketing of foot and ankle surgical devices and biologics. [2] Lapiplasty, Treace's novel primary surgical product, advanced the treatment of bunions, surgically correcting the metatarsal bone, for the first time, in all three dimensions.
